adminLogin.heading: Log in to Create Events
adminLogin.logInAndGiveDeveloper: Log in and give the developer your principal ID to make you an admin. If you are already assigned as an admin, just log in to continue.
adminLogin.copyAndGiveDeveloper: Copy and give the developer your principal ID to make you an admin. Please reload if you get Anonymous Principal: {{principalId}}

login.heading: Log in to Claim Rewards
login.helpText: You are just one step away from claiming your rewards. Please log in now to claim your rewards. Remember, you can only claim your rewards once.
login.claimHelpText01: Hello, You Have successfully Reserved your seat in
login.claimHelpText03: Please log in to claim your rewards.

claimSeat.noCreds: You do not have access to enter this event because your event ID and hex code are missing. Please rescan the QR code for the ICP event. If the issue persists, contact our support team for assistance.'
claimSeat.helpText: Great to see you've logged in! You're now ready to claim your seat number for the ICP Event. Simply click the 'Claim Seat' button to get started. This number is key to accessing event materials and participating fully. If you run into any issues or have questions, our support team is here to assist you. Enjoy the event!
claimSeat.welcomeText01: Your login via ICP has been successful, and you've claimed your seat with Number: {{seatNo}}. This number is key to your engagement and experiences throughout the event. Should you have any questions or require assistance at any point, our support team is here to help. Enjoy your time at the event!

qrCodeComponent.heading: Event QR Generation
qrCodeComponent.helpText: Welcome, Presenter! Here are the dynamically generated QR codes for your events. These QR codes serve as a convenient way for attendees to claim their seats. By scanning these codes, attendees can secure their spots and gain access to event materials and experiences. Encourage your attendees to have their smartphones ready and guide them to scan the QR codes using a QR code scanner app. Once scanned, attendees will be able to claim their seats and fully participate in the event. Should you need any assistance or have any questions, our support team is here to help. Enjoy a seamless and engaging event experience with the power of QR codes!

addEventModal.mustBeFuture: Date must be in the future
addEventModal.greaterThanStart: End date must be greater than start date

deleteEventModal.heading: Delete Event
deleteEventModal.approvalText: Are you sure you want to delete this event ? All event data will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone.
